body: This error is popping up during tests: "Error reading webpack-stats.json. Are you sure webpack has generated the file and the path is correct?". I wonder if we have to generate a webpack bundle before running the tests?
body_text: This error is popping up during tests: "Error reading webpack-stats.json. Are you sure webpack has generated the file and the path is correct?". I wonder if we have to generate a webpack bundle before running the tests?
